name: Sortable
description: Drag-and-drop sorting primitives with drop zones and scrolling.

use: you need draggable reordering of items.

examples.minimal:
Sortable<String>(
  items: const ['A', 'B', 'C'],
  itemBuilder: (context, item) => Text(item),
  onReorder: (items) {},
)

theming: Uses shared animation and layout defaults.
accessibility: Provide non-drag reorder alternatives when required.
dont: Disable scrolling during drag when lists are long.
